channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024030035
item.description:
Report X-2024030035

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS RESPONDING TO A CALL AT DOOR, ON ARRIVING RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE CLEARLY MARKED HAZMAT PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR. ON RETURNING TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER AND OPENING THE BOX, RESPONDER FOUND TWO OF THE BOTTLES HAD LEAKED CAUSING VISIBLE DAMAGE TO THE CARTON AS WELL AS THE OTHER BOTTLES IN THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024030092
item.description:
Report X-2024030092

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-29
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER SAW THIS PACKAGE ON A YELLOW PALLET UNDERNEATH THE EXTENDO OF DOOR 35. PACKAGE WAS VISIBLE WET AND STAINED. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION RESPONDER NOTICED IT WAS A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT. RESPONDER BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATING AND PROCESSING. WHEN RESPONDER OPENED UP THE BOX, RESPONDER COULD SEE THAT ALL THE BOTTLES HAD LEAKED. SINCE ALL THE BOTTLES WERE LEAKING, THEY WERE PROCESSED INTO THE DMP AS THEY CANNOT BE RETURNED IN A SALAVGE DRUM.

Report X-2024021703

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER DISPATCHED TO A LEAKNG PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD, AT DOOR. ON ARRIVING RESPONDER FOUND THE PACKAGE, MARKED AS A CORROSIVE. A SMALL PUDDLE WAS FORMING AT THE CORNER OF THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024021899
item.description:
Report X-2024021899

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-08
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING IN THE L-LOT. CALL MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER WENT TO CALL LOCATION FOLLOWED SMALL PACKAGE DECISON TREE AND DONNED PPE. CALL LOCATION WAS DEEMED TO DIFFICULT TO WORK AT TRAILER WAS MOVED TO UNLOAD FOR CLEAN UP. ALL PACKAGES AND DEBRIS WAS BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION LIMITED QUANTITY DIAMOND WAS DISCOVRED ON INTERNAL PACKAGING WITH ONE ON THE OUTER BOX. PACKAGE PROCESSED AS A POSSIBLE UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AN ACTIVE LEAKER WAS CALLED FOR. RESPONDER CONTAINED LEAKER, CLEANED UP SPILL AND TOOK TO PSC FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. DOCUMENT SEARCH REVEALED THAT PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED IMPROPERLY, UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2024021553
item.description:
Report X-2024021553

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATLEY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE COOLING FLAVOR SAMPLES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED IN THE AIR NETWORK. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024021563
item.description:
Report X-2024021563

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-04T15:11:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A WET PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FIFTEEN DEVICES CONTAINING LITHIUM ION BATTERIES. AT LEAST ONE APPEARS VISIBLY WARPED OR DAMAGED. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED NEXT DAY AIR FROM OKLAHOMA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER HH8169, GROVE TECHNOLOGY SERVICES LLC, 2230 PACIFIC AVE., FOREST GROVE OR 97116-2448.

item.title: Report X-2024021323
item.description:
Report X-2024021323

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T00:31:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-23
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A bottle of wheel and tire cleaner with no cap, leaked inside of the package causing outer packaging to fail. And that led to the discovery of the undeclared HAZMATs inside the packag. No leakage from the HAZMAT its self. DescribePack: Two sides of the package fell apart due to internal leakage, causing the sides of the package to disintegrate. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: No actions were needed.
